channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: EU Talks Delayed On Auto CO2 Rules, Small Cars Initiative
item.description: The EU meeting about the plan to outlaw the sale of new combustion vehicles by 2035 has been delayed and is expected to be rescheduled early in Januar...

item.title: Spotify users lamented Wrapped in 2024. This year, the company brought back an old favorite and made it less about AI
item.description: Spotify received blowback in 2024 for going all-in on AI at the last minute.

item.title: Detroit’s bizarre romance with its very own RoboCop statue reaches happy ending, 15 years after love/hate crowdfunding campaign kicked it off
item.description: The statue campaign appears to have started around 2010 when Detroit Mayor Dave Bing was tagged in a tweet about Philadelphia's "Rocky" statue.

item.title: Congress flatlines in attempt to regulate college sports with bill ‘not ready for prime time’
item.description: It’s only the latest delay for a bill that had appeared headed for passage over the summer before repeatedly hitting roadblocks.

item.title: Ford CEO hails Trump fuel standards reset as a 'victory' for affordability and common sense
item.description: New fuel economy standards under Trump will help automakers build what Americans want: affordable vehicles instead of expensive electric cars for cons...

item.title: Grand Canyon South Rim hotels forced to close due to water pipe breaks
item.description: Grand Canyon South Rim faces water emergency as broken pipeline forces hotel closures. Park remains open for day visits while water repairs continue.

item.title: Requiem For The Metaverse: On Meta's Missed Opportunity
item.description: Meta plans deep cuts to its metaverse and Reality Labs division in 2026 — how did it go from the next big thing to nothing?

item.title: Trump administration orders embassies, consulates to prioritize visas for sports fans traveling for World Cup, Olympics
item.description: In a series of cables to all U.S. diplomatic missions obtained by the AP, the State Department said certain applications should be at the top of the l...

item.title: Microsoft Teams Starts Telling Your Boss Where You Are—Now Just 8 Weeks Away
item.description: Microsoft confirms start date for new Teams update — no more hiding places.

item.title: Humana And Mark Cuban’s Cost Plus Drugs Working On Partnership
item.description: The health insurance giant Humana and Mark Cuban’s Cost Plus Drugs are discussing ways to partner to lower the cost of prescription drugs for U.S. emp...

item.title: Piling on Trump DOJ’s legitimacy issues, Letitia James challenges appointment of U.S. attorney suing her
item.description: The court hearing focusing on the role of John Sarcone, who is acting as U.S. attorney for northern New York.

item.title: L.A. Kicks Coal As It Fires Up The World’s Largest Green Hydrogen Power Plant
item.description: The city starts getting electricity next month from hydrogen made at a Utah plant – and stored beneath it in a vast salt cavern – to help get to 100% ...

item.title: Small businesses lead November job losses as tariff uncertainty weighs on hiring
item.description: Small businesses lost 120,000 jobs in November amid heightened economic uncertainty over tariffs and outpaced job gains at larger firms, according to ...

item.title: US sawmills warn of accelerating closures as tariffs, weak demand squeeze industry
item.description: U.S. sawmills say tariffs, shrinking export markets and competition from cheaper wood alternatives are driving a surge in closures that threatens the ...

item.title: Costco’s stock has turned negative for the year

item.description: Payroll processing firm ADP on Wednesday released its private sector jobs data for November. Employment in the private sector decreased by 32,000 jobs...

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
